EmailTemplate.subject: Your Copy of “The Advantages vs. Disadvantages of an Inertial Navigation System Infographic”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you!
Here is Your Copy of “The Advantages vs. Disadvantages of an Inertial Navigation System Infographic” <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Advantages-Disadvantages-Inertial-Navigation-System_infographic.pdf]]> We surveyed our HGuide inertial navigation engineers with more than 100 years of experience combined between them to help you better understand the advantages and disadvantages of using an inertial navigation system as compared to an inertial measurement unit. Download our infographic to discover our findings.
If you'd like to receive newsletters, product information and special offers from our HGuide team, please opt-in here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HGuide-sign-up.html]]>. Download my Infographic <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Advantages-Disadvantages-Inertial-Navigation-System_infographic.pdf]]>
